description: System, JVM, Pipeline and individual plugin stats (Published as https://grafana.com/grafana/dashboards/18628-logstash-monitoring-aws-dev/)

options.content:
# Logstash Metrics

This presents metrics for Logstash in the Acme NebulaOne Cluster.

There are three pipelines running:

* `telemetry-legacy`: A telemetry pipleine for legacy-format clients.
* `telemetry-json`: A telemetry pipeline for upgraded clients.
* `testing-stdout`: A testing pipeline, outputting only to stdout.

panels.title: Pipeline Status + Max Rate Last Hour
